mcq.statement: Where was the Muslim Students Federation (women wing) established by Begum Shaista Ikram-ullah in 1941?
mcq.one_liner: The Muslim Students Federation (women wing) was established in **Delhi** by Begum Shaista Ikram-ullah in 1941.
